entry.title: Monday: Mainly sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near noon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Light snow. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Light snow beginning near midnight. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13 with temperature rising to minus 9 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
